title: Can we buff yasuo's base AD
body: He sucks at last hitting with his auto attacks. Also vayne got an ad nerf. So yasuo should get some type of compensation

replies.body: Get ready for downvotes if you mention either Yasuo buffs or Yasuo nerfs.

Uh...wut...

Yas has one of the smoothest last hitting animations...and his E makes it easy as hell at level 1...
Yes, you are right.  Vayne was nerfed, better nerf Yasuo...  Oh wait, that's not how that goes is it?
Hmm. Need more water.. For my noodles..
